MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA9, PA12, KA15 & G78 postcode areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1:51pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of faulty electrical equipment located near Rigfoot Tulloch and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:40pm on Tuesday, 23 February 2021
